title: How Many Calories Are in a PB&J?
meta_description: Discover how many calories are in pbj, including full nutrition breakdown for carbs, protein, fat, and quick tweaks for variations.
h1: How Many Calories Are in a PB&J?
assumptions: Standard PB&J sandwich: 2 slices white bread, 2 tbsp peanut butter, 1 tbsp grape jelly; no added ingredients.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by bread type, PB brand, jelly flavor, portion sizes, and preparation; check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A standard PB&J sandwich has about 390 kcal, with 13 g protein and 50 g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Use whole wheat bread instead of white

faqs.q: How many calories are in pbj sandwich?
faqs.a: Approximately 390 kcal for a standard PB&J with 2 slices bread, 2 tbsp PB, and 1 tbsp jelly.

faqs.q: What's the protein in a PB&J?
faqs.a: About 13 g, mostly from the peanut butter.

faqs.q: Does PB&J have a lot of sugar?
faqs.a: Yes, around 20 g total, primarily from jelly and bread.

faqs.q: How to lower calories in pbj?
faqs.a: Use less peanut butter, opt for low-sugar jelly, or choose whole grain bread.
Moderate at 16 g total fat per sandwich, with 3 g saturated.
